actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to carry out the dredging project, Menominee Harbor, Menominee River, Michigan and Wisconsin.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to carry out a previously deauthorized navigation project for Menominee Harbor and River, Michigan and Wisconsin, notwithstanding that the benefits may not exceed the estimated costs of the project.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to carry out the dredging project, Menominee Harbor, Menominee River, Michigan and Wisconsin.
